00171 static const char *ui_item_name_add_colon(const char *name, char namestr[UI_MAX_NAME_STR])
00172 {
00173     int len = strlen(name);
00174 
00175     if (len != 0 && len + 1 < UI_MAX_NAME_STR) {
00176         BLI_strncpy(namestr, name, UI_MAX_NAME_STR);
00177         namestr[len] = ':';
00178         namestr[len + 1] = '\0';
00179         return namestr;
00180     }
00181 
00182     return name;
00183 }
00184 
00185 static int ui_item_fit(int item, int pos, int all, int available, int last, int alignment, int *offset)
00186 {
00187     /* available == 0 is unlimited */
00188     if (available == 0)
00189         return item;
00190     
00191     if (offset)
00192         *offset = 0;
00193     
00194     if (all > available) {
00195         /* contents is bigger than available space */
00196         if (last)
00197             return available - pos;
00198         else
00199             return (item * available) / all;
00200     }
00201     else {
00202         /* contents is smaller or equal to available space */
00203         if (alignment == UI_LAYOUT_ALIGN_EXPAND) {
00204             if (last)
00205                 return available - pos;
00206             else
00207                 return (item * available) / all;
00208         }
00209         else
00210             return item;
00211     }
00212 }
00213 
00214 /* variable button size in which direction? */
00215 #define UI_ITEM_VARY_X  1
00216 #define UI_ITEM_VARY_Y  2
00217 
00218 static int ui_layout_vary_direction(uiLayout *layout)
00219 {
00220     return (layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_HEADER || layout->alignment != UI_LAYOUT_ALIGN_EXPAND) ? UI_ITEM_VARY_X : UI_ITEM_VARY_Y;
00221 }
00222 
00223 /* estimated size of text + icon */
00224 static int ui_text_icon_width(uiLayout *layout, const char *name, int icon, int compact)
00225 {
00226     int variable = ui_layout_vary_direction(layout) == UI_ITEM_VARY_X;
00227 
00228     if (icon && !name[0])
00229         return UI_UNIT_X;  /* icon only */
00230     else if (icon)
00231         return (variable) ? UI_GetStringWidth(name) + (compact ? 5 : 10) + UI_UNIT_X : 10 * UI_UNIT_X;  /* icon + text */
00232     else
00233         return (variable) ? UI_GetStringWidth(name) + (compact ? 5 : 10) + UI_UNIT_X : 10 * UI_UNIT_X;  /* text only */
00234 }
00235 
00236 static void ui_item_size(uiItem *item, int *r_w, int *r_h)
00237 {
00238     if (item->type == ITEM_BUTTON) {
00239         uiButtonItem *bitem = (uiButtonItem *)item;
00240 
00241         if (r_w) *r_w = bitem->but->x2 - bitem->but->x1;
00242         if (r_h) *r_h = bitem->but->y2 - bitem->but->y1;
00243     }
00244     else {
00245         uiLayout *litem = (uiLayout *)item;
00246 
00247         if (r_w) *r_w = litem->w;
00248         if (r_h) *r_h = litem->h;
00249     }
00250 }
00251 
00252 static void ui_item_offset(uiItem *item, int *r_x, int *r_y)
00253 {
00254     if (item->type == ITEM_BUTTON) {
00255         uiButtonItem *bitem = (uiButtonItem *)item;
00256 
00257         if (r_x) *r_x = bitem->but->x1;
00258         if (r_y) *r_y = bitem->but->y1;
00259     }
00260     else {
00261         if (r_x) *r_x = 0;
00262         if (r_y) *r_y = 0;
00263     }
00264 }
00265 
00266 static void ui_item_position(uiItem *item, int x, int y, int w, int h)
00267 {
00268     if (item->type == ITEM_BUTTON) {
00269         uiButtonItem *bitem = (uiButtonItem *)item;
00270 
00271         bitem->but->x1 = x;
00272         bitem->but->y1 = y;
00273         bitem->but->x2 = x + w;
00274         bitem->but->y2 = y + h;
00275         
00276         ui_check_but(bitem->but); /* for strlen */
00277     }
00278     else {
00279         uiLayout *litem = (uiLayout *)item;
00280 
00281         litem->x = x;
00282         litem->y = y + h;
00283         litem->w = w;
00284         litem->h = h;
00285     }
00286 }

00290 static int ui_layout_local_dir(uiLayout *layout)
00291 {
00292     switch (layout->item.type) {
00293         case ITEM_LAYOUT_ROW:
00294         case ITEM_LAYOUT_ROOT:
00295         case ITEM_LAYOUT_OVERLAP:
00296             return UI_LAYOUT_HORIZONTAL;
00297         case ITEM_LAYOUT_COLUMN:
00298         case ITEM_LAYOUT_COLUMN_FLOW:
00299         case ITEM_LAYOUT_SPLIT:
00300         case ITEM_LAYOUT_ABSOLUTE:
00301         case ITEM_LAYOUT_BOX:
00302         default:
00303             return UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL;
00304     }
00305 }
00306 
00307 static uiLayout *ui_item_local_sublayout(uiLayout *test, uiLayout *layout, int align)
00308 {
00309     uiLayout *sub;
00310 
00311     if (ui_layout_local_dir(test) == UI_LAYOUT_HORIZONTAL)
00312         sub = uiLayoutRow(layout, align);
00313     else
00314         sub = uiLayoutColumn(layout, align);
00315     
00316     sub->space = 0;
00317     return sub;
00318 }

00320 static void ui_layer_but_cb(bContext *C, void *arg_but, void *arg_index)
00321 {
00322     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00323     uiBut *but = arg_but, *cbut;
00324     PointerRNA *ptr = &but->rnapoin;
00325     PropertyRNA *prop = but->rnaprop;
00326     int i, index = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(arg_index);
00327     int shift = win->eventstate->shift;
00328     int len = RNA_property_array_length(ptr, prop);
00329 
00330     if (!shift) {
00331         RNA_property_boolean_set_index(ptr, prop, index, TRUE);
00332 
00333         for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
00334             if (i != index)
00335                 RNA_property_boolean_set_index(ptr, prop, i, 0);
00336 
00337         RNA_property_update(C, ptr, prop);
00338 
00339         for (cbut = but->block->buttons.first; cbut; cbut = cbut->next)
00340             ui_check_but(cbut);
00341     }
00342 }

00344 /* create buttons for an item with an RNA array */
00345 static void ui_item_array(uiLayout *layout, uiBlock *block, const char *name, int icon, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *prop, int len, int x, int y, int w, int UNUSED(h), int expand, int slider, int toggle, int icon_only)
00346 {
00347     uiStyle *style = layout->root->style;
00348     uiBut *but;
00349     PropertyType type;
00350     PropertySubType subtype;
00351     uiLayout *sub;
00352     int a, b;
00353 
00354     /* retrieve type and subtype */
00355     type = RNA_property_type(prop);
00356     subtype = RNA_property_subtype(prop);
00357 
00358     sub = ui_item_local_sublayout(layout, layout, 1);
00359     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, sub);
00360 
00361     /* create label */
00362     if (name[0])
00363         uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, name, 0, 0, w, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00364 
00365     /* create buttons */
00366     if (type == PROP_BOOLEAN && ELEM(subtype, PROP_LAYER, PROP_LAYER_MEMBER)) {
00367         /* special check for layer layout */
00368         int butw, buth, unit;
00369         int cols = (len >= 20) ? 2 : 1;
00370         int colbuts = len / (2 * cols);
00371         int layer_used = 0;
00372 
00373         uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, uiLayoutAbsolute(layout, 0));
00374 
00375         unit = UI_UNIT_X * 0.75;
00376         butw = unit;
00377         buth = unit;
00378 
00379         if (ptr->type == &RNA_Armature) {
00380             bArmature *arm = (bArmature *)ptr->data;
00381             layer_used = arm->layer_used;
00382         }
00383 
00384         for (b = 0; b < cols; b++) {
00385             uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00386 
00387             for (a = 0; a < colbuts; a++) {
00388                 if (layer_used & (1 << (a + b * colbuts))) icon = ICON_LAYER_USED;
00389                 else icon = ICON_BLANK1;
00390 
00391                 but = uiDefAutoButR(block, ptr, prop, a + b * colbuts, "", icon, x + butw * a, y + buth, butw, buth);
00392                 if (subtype == PROP_LAYER_MEMBER)
00393                     uiButSetFunc(but, ui_layer_but_cb, but, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(a + b * colbuts));
00394             }
00395             for (a = 0; a < colbuts; a++) {
00396                 if (layer_used & (1 << (a + len / 2 + b * colbuts))) icon = ICON_LAYER_USED;
00397                 else icon = ICON_BLANK1;
00398 
00399                 but = uiDefAutoButR(block, ptr, prop, a + len / 2 + b * colbuts, "", icon, x + butw * a, y, butw, buth);
00400                 if (subtype == PROP_LAYER_MEMBER)
00401                     uiButSetFunc(but, ui_layer_but_cb, but, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(a + len / 2 + b * colbuts));
00402             }
00403             uiBlockEndAlign(block);
00404 
00405             x += colbuts * butw + style->buttonspacex;
00406         }
00407     }
00408     else if (subtype == PROP_MATRIX) {
00409         int totdim, dim_size[3];    /* 3 == RNA_MAX_ARRAY_DIMENSION */
00410         int row, col;
00411 
00412         uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, uiLayoutAbsolute(layout, 1));
00413 
00414         totdim = RNA_property_array_dimension(ptr, prop, dim_size);
00415         if (totdim != 2) return;    /* only 2D matrices supported in UI so far */
00416         
00417         w /= dim_size[0];
00418         /* h /= dim_size[1]; */ /* UNUSED */
00419 
00420         for (a = 0; a < len; a++) {
00421             col = a % dim_size[0];
00422             row = a / dim_size[0];
00423 
00424             but = uiDefAutoButR(block, ptr, prop, a, "", ICON_NONE, x + w * col, y + (dim_size[1] * UI_UNIT_Y) - (row * UI_UNIT_Y), w, UI_UNIT_Y);
00425             if (slider && but->type == NUM)
00426                 but->type = NUMSLI;
00427         }
00428     }
00429     else if (subtype == PROP_DIRECTION) {
00430         uiDefButR_prop(block, BUT_NORMAL, 0, name, x, y, UI_UNIT_X * 3, UI_UNIT_Y * 3, ptr, prop, 0, 0, 0, -1, -1, NULL);
00431     }
00432     else {
00433         /* note, this block of code is a bit arbitrary and has just been made
00434          * to work with common cases, but may need to be re-worked */
00435 
00436         /* special case, boolean array in a menu, this could be used in a more generic way too */
00437         if (ELEM(subtype, PROP_COLOR, PROP_COLOR_GAMMA) && !expand) {
00438             uiDefAutoButR(block, ptr, prop, -1, "", ICON_NONE, 0, 0, w, UI_UNIT_Y);
00439         }
00440         else {
00441             int *boolarr = NULL;
00442 
00443             /* even if 'expand' is fale, expanding anyway */
00444 
00445             /* layout for known array subtypes */
00446             char str[3] = {'\0'};
00447 
00448             if (!icon_only) {
00449                 if (type != PROP_BOOLEAN) {
00450                     str[1] = ':';
00451                 }
00452             }
00453 
00454             /* show checkboxes for rna on a non-emboss block (menu for eg) */
00455             if (type == PROP_BOOLEAN && ELEM(layout->root->block->dt, UI_EMBOSSN, UI_EMBOSSP)) {
00456                 boolarr = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int) * len, "ui_item_array");
00457                 RNA_property_boolean_get_array(ptr, prop, boolarr);
00458             }
00459 
00460             for (a = 0; a < len; a++) {
00461                 if (!icon_only) str[0] = RNA_property_array_item_char(prop, a);
00462                 if (boolarr) icon = boolarr[a] ? ICON_CHECKBOX_HLT : ICON_CHECKBOX_DEHLT;
00463                 but = uiDefAutoButR(block, ptr, prop, a, str, icon, 0, 0, w, UI_UNIT_Y);
00464                 if (slider && but->type == NUM)
00465                     but->type = NUMSLI;
00466                 if (toggle && but->type == OPTION)
00467                     but->type = TOG;
00468             }
00469 
00470             if (boolarr) {
00471                 MEM_freeN(boolarr);
00472             }
00473         }
00474     }
00475 
00476     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, layout);
00477 }
00478 
00479 static void ui_item_enum_expand(uiLayout *layout, uiBlock *block, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *prop, const char *uiname, int h, int icon_only)
00480 {
00481     uiBut *but;
00482     EnumPropertyItem *item;
00483     const char *name;
00484     int a, totitem, itemw, icon, value, free;
00485 
00486     RNA_property_enum_items_gettexted(block->evil_C, ptr, prop, &item, &totitem, &free);
00487 
00488     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, ui_item_local_sublayout(layout, layout, 1));
00489     for (a = 0; a < totitem; a++) {
00490         if (!item[a].identifier[0])
00491             continue;
00492 
00493         name = (!uiname || uiname[0]) ? item[a].name : "";
00494         icon = item[a].icon;
00495         value = item[a].value;
00496         itemw = ui_text_icon_width(block->curlayout, name, icon, 0);
00497 
00498         if (icon && name[0] && !icon_only)
00499             but = uiDefIconTextButR_prop(block, ROW, 0, icon, name, 0, 0, itemw, h, ptr, prop, -1, 0, value, -1, -1, NULL);
00500         else if (icon)
00501             but = uiDefIconButR_prop(block, ROW, 0, icon, 0, 0, itemw, h, ptr, prop, -1, 0, value, -1, -1, NULL);
00502         else
00503             but = uiDefButR_prop(block, ROW, 0, name, 0, 0, itemw, h, ptr, prop, -1, 0, value, -1, -1, NULL);
00504 
00505         if (ui_layout_local_dir(layout) != UI_LAYOUT_HORIZONTAL)
00506             but->flag |= UI_TEXT_LEFT;
00507     }
00508     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, layout);
00509 
00510     if (free) {
00511         MEM_freeN(item);
00512     }
00513 }

00515 /* callback for keymap item change button */
00516 static void ui_keymap_but_cb(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *but_v, void *UNUSED(key_v))
00517 {
00518     uiBut *but = but_v;
00519 
00520     RNA_boolean_set(&but->rnapoin, "shift", (but->modifier_key & KM_SHIFT) != 0);
00521     RNA_boolean_set(&but->rnapoin, "ctrl", (but->modifier_key & KM_CTRL) != 0);
00522     RNA_boolean_set(&but->rnapoin, "alt", (but->modifier_key & KM_ALT) != 0);
00523     RNA_boolean_set(&but->rnapoin, "oskey", (but->modifier_key & KM_OSKEY) != 0);
00524 }

00526 /* create label + button for RNA property */
00527 static uiBut *ui_item_with_label(uiLayout *layout, uiBlock *block, const char *name, int icon, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *prop, int index, int x, int y, int w, int h, int flag)
00528 {
00529     uiLayout *sub;
00530     uiBut *but = NULL;
00531     PropertyType type;
00532     PropertySubType subtype;
00533     int labelw;
00534 
00535     sub = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
00536     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, sub);
00537 
00538     if (name[0]) {
00539         /* XXX UI_GetStringWidth is not accurate */
00540 #if 0
00541         labelw = UI_GetStringWidth(name);
00542         CLAMP(labelw, w / 4, 3 * w / 4);
00543 #endif
00544         labelw = w / 3;
00545         uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, name, x, y, labelw, h, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00546         w = w - labelw;
00547     }
00548 
00549     type = RNA_property_type(prop);
00550     subtype = RNA_property_subtype(prop);
00551 
00552     if (subtype == PROP_FILEPATH || subtype == PROP_DIRPATH) {
00553         uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, uiLayoutRow(sub, 1));
00554         uiDefAutoButR(block, ptr, prop, index, "", icon, x, y, w - UI_UNIT_X, h);
00555 
00556         /* BUTTONS_OT_file_browse calls uiFileBrowseContextProperty */
00557         but = uiDefIconButO(block, BUT, subtype == PROP_DIRPATH ?
00558                             "BUTTONS_OT_directory_browse" :
00559                             "BUTTONS_OT_file_browse",
00560                             WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, ICON_FILESEL, x, y, UI_UNIT_X, h, NULL);
00561     }
00562     else if (flag & UI_ITEM_R_EVENT) {
00563         uiDefButR_prop(block, KEYEVT, 0, name, x, y, w, h, ptr, prop, index, 0, 0, -1, -1, NULL);
00564     }
00565     else if (flag & UI_ITEM_R_FULL_EVENT) {
00566         if (RNA_struct_is_a(ptr->type, &RNA_KeyMapItem)) {
00567             char buf[128];
00568 
00569             WM_keymap_item_to_string(ptr->data, buf, sizeof(buf));
00570 
00571             but = uiDefButR_prop(block, HOTKEYEVT, 0, buf, x, y, w, h, ptr, prop, 0, 0, 0, -1, -1, NULL);
00572             uiButSetFunc(but, ui_keymap_but_cb, but, NULL);
00573             if (flag & UI_ITEM_R_IMMEDIATE)
00574                 uiButSetFlag(but, UI_BUT_IMMEDIATE);
00575         }
00576     }
00577     else
00578         but = uiDefAutoButR(block, ptr, prop, index, (type == PROP_ENUM && !(flag & UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY)) ? NULL : "", icon, x, y, w, h);
00579 
00580     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, layout);
00581     return but;
00582 }
00583 
00584 void uiFileBrowseContextProperty(const bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA **prop)
00585 {
00586     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00587     uiBlock *block;
00588     uiBut *but, *prevbut;
00589 
00590     memset(ptr, 0, sizeof(*ptr));
00591     *prop = NULL;
00592 
00593     if (!ar)
00594         return;
00595 
00596     for (block = ar->uiblocks.first; block; block = block->next) {
00597         for (but = block->buttons.first; but; but = but->next) {
00598             prevbut = but->prev;
00599 
00600             /* find the button before the active one */
00601             if ((but->flag & UI_BUT_LAST_ACTIVE) && prevbut && prevbut->rnapoin.data) {
00602                 if (RNA_property_type(prevbut->rnaprop) == PROP_STRING) {
00603                     *ptr = prevbut->rnapoin;
00604                     *prop = prevbut->rnaprop;
00605                     return;
00606                 }
00607             }
00608         }
00609     }
00610 }
00611 
00612 /********************* Button Items *************************/
00613 
00614 /* disabled item */
00615 static void ui_item_disabled(uiLayout *layout, const char *name)
00616 {
00617     uiBlock *block = layout->root->block;
00618     uiBut *but;
00619     int w;
00620 
00621     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, layout);
00622 
00623     if (!name)
00624         name = "";
00625 
00626     w = ui_text_icon_width(layout, name, 0, 0);
00627 
00628     but = uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, name, 0, 0, w, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00629     but->flag |= UI_BUT_DISABLED;
00630     but->lock = 1;
00631     but->lockstr = "";
00632 }
00633 
00634 /* operator items */
00635 PointerRNA uiItemFullO_ptr(uiLayout *layout, wmOperatorType *ot, const char *name, int icon, IDProperty *properties, int context, int flag)
00636 {
00637     uiBlock *block = layout->root->block;
00638     uiBut *but;
00639     int w;
00640 
00641     if (!name) {
00642         if (ot && ot->srna)
00643             name = RNA_struct_ui_name(ot->srna);
00644         else
00645             name = "";
00646     }
00647 
00648     if (layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_MENU && !icon)
00649         icon = ICON_BLANK1;
00650 
00651     /* create button */
00652     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, layout);
00653 
00654     w = ui_text_icon_width(layout, name, icon, 0);
00655 
00656     if (flag & UI_ITEM_R_NO_BG)
00657         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSSN);
00658 
00659     /* create the button */
00660     if (icon) {
00661         if (name[0]) {
00662             but = uiDefIconTextButO_ptr(block, BUT, ot, context, icon, name, 0, 0, w, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL);
00663         }
00664         else {
00665             but = uiDefIconButO_ptr(block, BUT, ot, context, icon, 0, 0, w, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL);
00666         }
00667     }
00668     else {
00669         but = uiDefButO_ptr(block, BUT, ot, context, name, 0, 0, w, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL);
00670     }
00671 
00672     assert(but->optype != NULL);
00673 
00674     /* text alignment for toolbar buttons */
00675     if ((layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_TOOLBAR) && !icon)
00676         but->flag |= UI_TEXT_LEFT;
00677 
00678     if (flag & UI_ITEM_R_NO_BG)
00679         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSS);
00680 
00681     if (layout->redalert)
00682         uiButSetFlag(but, UI_BUT_REDALERT);
00683 
00684     /* assign properties */
00685     if (properties || (flag & UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS)) {
00686         PointerRNA *opptr = uiButGetOperatorPtrRNA(but);
00687 
00688         if (properties) {
00689             opptr->data = properties;
00690         }
00691         else {
00692             IDPropertyTemplate val = {0};
00693             opptr->data = IDP_New(IDP_GROUP, &val, "wmOperatorProperties");
00694         }
00695 
00696         return *opptr;
00697     }
00698 
00699     return PointerRNA_NULL;
00700 }
00701 
00702 PointerRNA uiItemFullO(uiLayout *layout, const char *opname, const char *name, int icon, IDProperty *properties, int context, int flag)
00703 {
00704     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find(opname, 0); /* print error next */
00705 
00706     UI_OPERATOR_ERROR_RET(ot, opname, return PointerRNA_NULL);
00707 
00708     return uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, name, icon, properties, context, flag);
00709 }
00710 
00711 static const char *ui_menu_enumpropname(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *prop, int retval)
00712 {
00713     EnumPropertyItem *item;
00714     int totitem, free;
00715     const char *name;
00716 
00717     RNA_property_enum_items_gettexted(layout->root->block->evil_C, ptr, prop, &item, &totitem, &free);
00718     if (RNA_enum_name(item, retval, &name) == 0) {
00719         name = "";
00720     }
00721 
00722     if (free) {
00723         MEM_freeN(item);
00724     }
00725 
00726     return name;
00727 }
00728 
00729 /* same as below but 'prop' is already known */
00730 static void uiItemEnumO_ptr__internal(uiLayout *layout, wmOperatorType *ot, const char *name, int icon, PropertyRNA *prop, int value)
00731 {
00732     PointerRNA ptr;
00733     WM_operator_properties_create_ptr(&ptr, ot);
00734     RNA_property_enum_set(&ptr, prop, value);
00735 
00736     if (!name)
00737         name = ui_menu_enumpropname(layout, &ptr, prop, value);
00738 
00739     uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, name, icon, ptr.data, layout->root->opcontext, 0);
00740 }
00741 void uiItemEnumO_ptr(uiLayout *layout, wmOperatorType *ot, const char *name, int icon, const char *propname, int value)
00742 {
00743     PointerRNA ptr;
00744     PropertyRNA *prop;
00745 
00746     WM_operator_properties_create_ptr(&ptr, ot);
00747 
00748     if ((prop = RNA_struct_find_property(&ptr, propname))) {
00749         /* pass */
00750     }
00751     else {
00752         RNA_warning("%s.%s not found", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr.type), propname);
00753         return;
00754     }
00755 
00756     RNA_property_enum_set(&ptr, prop, value);
00757 
00758     if (!name)
00759         name = ui_menu_enumpropname(layout, &ptr, prop, value);
00760 
00761     uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, name, icon, ptr.data, layout->root->opcontext, 0);
00762 }
00763 void uiItemEnumO(uiLayout *layout, const char *opname, const char *name, int icon, const char *propname, int value)
00764 {
00765     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find(opname, 0); /* print error next */
00766 
00767     if (ot) {
00768         uiItemEnumO_ptr(layout, ot, name, icon, propname, value);
00769     }
00770     else {
00771         ui_item_disabled(layout, opname);
00772         RNA_warning("unknown operator '%s'", opname);
00773     }
00774 
00775 }
00776 
00777 void uiItemsFullEnumO(uiLayout *layout, const char *opname, const char *propname, IDProperty *properties, int context, int flag)
00778 {
00779     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find(opname, 0); /* print error next */
00780 
00781     PointerRNA ptr;
00782     PropertyRNA *prop;
00783     uiBut *bt;
00784     uiBlock *block = layout->root->block;
00785 
00786     if (!ot || !ot->srna) {
00787         ui_item_disabled(layout, opname);
00788         RNA_warning("%s '%s'", ot ? "unknown operator" : "operator missing srna", opname);
00789         return;
00790     }
00791 
00792     RNA_pointer_create(NULL, ot->srna, NULL, &ptr);
00793     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(&ptr, propname);
00794 
00795     /* don't let bad properties slip through */
00796     BLI_assert((prop == NULL) || (RNA_property_type(prop) == PROP_ENUM));
00797 
00798     if (prop && RNA_property_type(prop) == PROP_ENUM) {
00799         EnumPropertyItem *item;
00800         int totitem, i, free;
00801         uiLayout *split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0, 0);
00802         uiLayout *column = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
00803 
00804         RNA_property_enum_items_gettexted(block->evil_C, &ptr, prop, &item, &totitem, &free);
00805 
00806         for (i = 0; i < totitem; i++) {
00807             if (item[i].identifier[0]) {
00808                 if (properties) {
00809                     PointerRNA tptr;
00810 
00811                     WM_operator_properties_create_ptr(&tptr, ot);
00812                     if (tptr.data) {
00813                         IDP_FreeProperty(tptr.data);
00814                         MEM_freeN(tptr.data);
00815                     }
00816                     tptr.data = IDP_CopyProperty(properties);
00817                     RNA_property_enum_set(&tptr, prop, item[i].value);
00818 
00819                     uiItemFullO_ptr(column, ot, item[i].name, item[i].icon, tptr.data, context, flag);
00820                 }
00821                 else {
00822                     uiItemEnumO_ptr__internal(column, ot, item[i].name, item[i].icon, prop, item[i].value);
00823                 }
00824             }
00825             else {
00826                 if (item[i].name) {
00827                     if (i != 0) {
00828                         column = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
00829                         /* inconsistent, but menus with labels do not look good flipped */
00830                         block->flag |= UI_BLOCK_NO_FLIP;
00831                     }
00832 
00833                     uiItemL(column, item[i].name, ICON_NONE);
00834                     bt = block->buttons.last;
00835                     bt->flag = UI_TEXT_LEFT;
00836                 }
00837                 else /* XXX bug here, collums draw bottom item badly */
00838                     uiItemS(column);
00839             }
00840         }
00841 
00842         if (free) {
00843             MEM_freeN(item);
00844         }
00845     }
00846 }
00847 
00848 void uiItemsEnumO(uiLayout *layout, const char *opname, const char *propname)
00849 {
00850     uiItemsFullEnumO(layout, opname, propname, NULL, layout->root->opcontext, 0);
00851 }
00852 
00853 /* for use in cases where we have */
00854 void uiItemEnumO_value(uiLayout *layout, const char *name, int icon, const char *opname, const char *propname, int value)
00855 {
00856     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find(opname, 0); /* print error next */
00857     PointerRNA ptr;
00858     PropertyRNA *prop;
00859 
00860     UI_OPERATOR_ERROR_RET(ot, opname, return );
00861 
00862     WM_operator_properties_create_ptr(&ptr, ot);
00863 
00864     /* enum lookup */
00865     if ((prop = RNA_struct_find_property(&ptr, propname))) {
00866         /* pass */
00867     }
00868     else {
00869         RNA_warning("%s.%s not found", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr.type), propname);
00870         return;
00871     }
00872 
00873     RNA_property_enum_set(&ptr, prop, value);
00874 
00875     /* same as uiItemEnumO */
00876     if (!name)
00877         name = ui_menu_enumpropname(layout, &ptr, prop, value);
00878 
00879     uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, name, icon, ptr.data, layout->root->opcontext, 0);
00880 }
00881 
00882 void uiItemEnumO_string(uiLayout *layout, const char *name, int icon, const char *opname, const char *propname, const char *value_str)
00883 {
00884     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find(opname, 0); /* print error next */
00885     PointerRNA ptr;
00886     PropertyRNA *prop;
00887 
00888     EnumPropertyItem *item;
00889     int value, free;
00890 
00891     UI_OPERATOR_ERROR_RET(ot, opname, return );
00892 
00893     WM_operator_properties_create_ptr(&ptr, ot);
00894     
00895     /* enum lookup */
00896     if ((prop = RNA_struct_find_property(&ptr, propname))) {
00897         RNA_property_enum_items_gettexted(layout->root->block->evil_C, &ptr, prop, &item, NULL, &free);
00898         if (item == NULL || RNA_enum_value_from_id(item, value_str, &value) == 0) {
00899             if (free) {
00900                 MEM_freeN(item);
00901             }
00902             RNA_warning("%s.%s, enum %s not found", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr.type), propname, value_str);
00903             return;
00904         }
00905 
00906         if (free) {
00907             MEM_freeN(item);
00908         }
00909     }
00910     else {
00911         RNA_warning("%s.%s not found", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr.type), propname);
00912         return;
00913     }
00914     
00915     RNA_property_enum_set(&ptr, prop, value);
00916     
00917     /* same as uiItemEnumO */
00918     if (!name)
00919         name = ui_menu_enumpropname(layout, &ptr, prop, value);
00920 
00921     uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, name, icon, ptr.data, layout->root->opcontext, 0);
00922 }

00980 
00981 /* RNA property items */
00982 
00983 static void ui_item_rna_size(uiLayout *layout, const char *name, int icon, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *prop, int index, int icon_only, int *r_w, int *r_h)
00984 {
00985     PropertyType type;
00986     PropertySubType subtype;
00987     int len, w, h;
00988 
00989     /* arbitrary extended width by type */
00990     type = RNA_property_type(prop);
00991     subtype = RNA_property_subtype(prop);
00992     len = RNA_property_array_length(ptr, prop);
00993 
00994     if (ELEM3(type, PROP_STRING, PROP_POINTER, PROP_ENUM) && !name[0] && !icon_only)
00995         name = "non-empty text";
00996     else if (type == PROP_BOOLEAN && !name[0] && !icon_only)
00997         icon = ICON_DOT;
00998 
00999     w = ui_text_icon_width(layout, name, icon, 0);
01000     h = UI_UNIT_Y;
01001 
01002     /* increase height for arrays */
01003     if (index == RNA_NO_INDEX && len > 0) {
01004         if (!name[0] && icon == ICON_NONE)
01005             h = 0;
01006 
01007         if (ELEM(subtype, PROP_LAYER, PROP_LAYER_MEMBER))
01008             h += 2 * UI_UNIT_Y;
01009         else if (subtype == PROP_MATRIX)
01010             h += ceil(sqrt(len)) * UI_UNIT_Y;
01011         else
01012             h += len * UI_UNIT_Y;
01013     }
01014     else if (ui_layout_vary_direction(layout) == UI_ITEM_VARY_X) {
01015         if (type == PROP_BOOLEAN && name[0])
01016             w += UI_UNIT_X / 5;
01017         else if (type == PROP_ENUM)
01018             w += UI_UNIT_X / 4;
01019         else if (type == PROP_FLOAT || type == PROP_INT)
01020             w += UI_UNIT_X * 3;
01021     }
01022 
01023     *r_w = w;
01024     *r_h = h;
01025 }
01026 
01027 void uiItemFullR(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *prop, int index, int value, int flag, const char *name, int icon)
01028 {
01029     uiBlock *block = layout->root->block;
01030     uiBut *but;
01031     PropertyType type;
01032     char namestr[UI_MAX_NAME_STR];
01033     int len, is_array, w, h, slider, toggle, expand, icon_only, no_bg;
01034 
01035     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, layout);
01036 
01037     /* retrieve info */
01038     type = RNA_property_type(prop);
01039     is_array = RNA_property_array_check(prop);
01040     len = (is_array) ? RNA_property_array_length(ptr, prop) : 0;
01041 
01042     /* set name and icon */
01043     if (!name)
01044         name = RNA_property_ui_name(prop);
01045     if (icon == ICON_NONE)
01046         icon = RNA_property_ui_icon(prop);
01047     
01048     if (ELEM4(type, PROP_INT, PROP_FLOAT, PROP_STRING, PROP_POINTER))
01049         name = ui_item_name_add_colon(name, namestr);
01050     else if (type == PROP_BOOLEAN && is_array && index == RNA_NO_INDEX)
01051         name = ui_item_name_add_colon(name, namestr);
01052     else if (type == PROP_ENUM && index != RNA_ENUM_VALUE)
01053         name = ui_item_name_add_colon(name, namestr);
01054 
01055     if (layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_MENU) {
01056         if (type == PROP_BOOLEAN && ((is_array == FALSE) || (index != RNA_NO_INDEX))) {
01057             if (is_array) icon = (RNA_property_boolean_get_index(ptr, prop, index)) ? ICON_CHECKBOX_HLT : ICON_CHECKBOX_DEHLT;
01058             else icon = (RNA_property_boolean_get(ptr, prop)) ? ICON_CHECKBOX_HLT : ICON_CHECKBOX_DEHLT;
01059         }
01060         else if (type == PROP_ENUM && index == RNA_ENUM_VALUE) {
01061             int enum_value = RNA_property_enum_get(ptr, prop);
01062             if (RNA_property_flag(prop) & PROP_ENUM_FLAG) {
01063                 icon = (enum_value & value) ? ICON_CHECKBOX_HLT : ICON_CHECKBOX_DEHLT;
01064             }
01065             else {
01066                 icon = (enum_value == value) ? ICON_CHECKBOX_HLT : ICON_CHECKBOX_DEHLT;
01067             }
01068         }
01069     }
01070 
01071     slider = (flag & UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER);
01072     toggle = (flag & UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE);
01073     expand = (flag & UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND);
01074     icon_only = (flag & UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY);
01075     no_bg = (flag & UI_ITEM_R_NO_BG);
01076 
01077     /* get size */
01078     ui_item_rna_size(layout, name, icon, ptr, prop, index, icon_only, &w, &h);
01079 
01080     if (no_bg)
01081         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSSN);
01082     
01083     /* array property */
01084     if (index == RNA_NO_INDEX && is_array)
01085         ui_item_array(layout, block, name, icon, ptr, prop, len, 0, 0, w, h, expand, slider, toggle, icon_only);
01086     /* enum item */
01087     else if (type == PROP_ENUM && index == RNA_ENUM_VALUE) {
01088         if (icon && name[0] && !icon_only)
01089             uiDefIconTextButR_prop(block, ROW, 0, icon, name, 0, 0, w, h, ptr, prop, -1, 0, value, -1, -1, NULL);
01090         else if (icon)
01091             uiDefIconButR_prop(block, ROW, 0, icon, 0, 0, w, h, ptr, prop, -1, 0, value, -1, -1, NULL);
01092         else
01093             uiDefButR_prop(block, ROW, 0, name, 0, 0, w, h, ptr, prop, -1, 0, value, -1, -1, NULL);
01094     }
01095     /* expanded enum */
01096     else if (type == PROP_ENUM && (expand || RNA_property_flag(prop) & PROP_ENUM_FLAG))
01097         ui_item_enum_expand(layout, block, ptr, prop, name, h, icon_only);
01098     /* property with separate label */
01099     else if (type == PROP_ENUM || type == PROP_STRING || type == PROP_POINTER) {
01100         but = ui_item_with_label(layout, block, name, icon, ptr, prop, index, 0, 0, w, h, flag);
01101         ui_but_add_search(but, ptr, prop, NULL, NULL);
01102         
01103         if (layout->redalert)
01104             uiButSetFlag(but, UI_BUT_REDALERT);
01105     }
01106     /* single button */
01107     else {
01108         but = uiDefAutoButR(block, ptr, prop, index, name, icon, 0, 0, w, h);
01109 
01110         if (slider && but->type == NUM)
01111             but->type = NUMSLI;
01112 
01113         if (toggle && but->type == OPTION)
01114             but->type = TOG;
01115         
01116         if (layout->redalert)
01117             uiButSetFlag(but, UI_BUT_REDALERT);
01118     }
01119     
01120     if (no_bg)
01121         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSS);
01122 }
01123 
01124 void uiItemR(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, const char *propname, int flag, const char *name, int icon)
01125 {
01126     PropertyRNA *prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, propname);
01127 
01128     if (!prop) {
01129         ui_item_disabled(layout, propname);
01130         RNA_warning("property not found: %s.%s", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
01131         return;
01132     }
01133 
01134     uiItemFullR(layout, ptr, prop, RNA_NO_INDEX, 0, flag, name, icon);
01135 }
01136 
01137 void uiItemEnumR(uiLayout *layout, const char *name, int icon, struct PointerRNA *ptr, const char *propname, int value)
01138 {
01139     PropertyRNA *prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, propname);
01140 
01141     if (!prop || RNA_property_type(prop) != PROP_ENUM) {
01142         ui_item_disabled(layout, propname);
01143         RNA_warning("property not found: %s.%s", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
01144         return;
01145     }
01146 
01147     uiItemFullR(layout, ptr, prop, RNA_ENUM_VALUE, value, 0, name, icon);
01148 }
01149 
01150 void uiItemEnumR_string(uiLayout *layout, struct PointerRNA *ptr, const char *propname, const char *value, const char *name, int icon)
01151 {
01152     PropertyRNA *prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, propname);
01153     EnumPropertyItem *item;
01154     int ivalue, a, free;
01155 
01156     if (!prop || RNA_property_type(prop) != PROP_ENUM) {
01157         ui_item_disabled(layout, propname);
01158         RNA_warning("enum property not found: %s.%s", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
01159         return;
01160     }
01161 
01162     RNA_property_enum_items_gettexted(layout->root->block->evil_C, ptr, prop, &item, NULL, &free);
01163 
01164     if (!RNA_enum_value_from_id(item, value, &ivalue)) {
01165         if (free) {
01166             MEM_freeN(item);
01167         }
01168         ui_item_disabled(layout, propname);
01169         RNA_warning("enum property value not found: %s", value);
01170         return;
01171     }
01172 
01173     for (a = 0; item[a].identifier; a++) {
01174         if (item[a].value == ivalue) {
01175             uiItemFullR(layout, ptr, prop, RNA_ENUM_VALUE, ivalue, 0, name ? name : item[a].name, icon ? icon : item[a].icon);
01176             break;
01177         }
01178     }
01179 
01180     if (free) {
01181         MEM_freeN(item);
01182     }
01183 }
01184 
01185 void uiItemsEnumR(uiLayout *layout, struct PointerRNA *ptr, const char *propname)
01186 {
01187     PropertyRNA *prop;
01188     uiBlock *block = layout->root->block;
01189     uiBut *bt;
01190 
01191     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, propname);
01192 
01193     if (!prop) {
01194         ui_item_disabled(layout, propname);
01195         RNA_warning("enum property not found: %s.%s", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
01196         return;
01197     }
01198 
01199     if (RNA_property_type(prop) != PROP_ENUM) {
01200         RNA_warning("not an enum property: %s.%s", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
01201         return;
01202     }
01203     else {
01204         EnumPropertyItem *item;
01205         int totitem, i, free;
01206         uiLayout *split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0, 0);
01207         uiLayout *column = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
01208 
01209         RNA_property_enum_items_gettexted(block->evil_C, ptr, prop, &item, &totitem, &free);
01210 
01211         for (i = 0; i < totitem; i++) {
01212             if (item[i].identifier[0]) {
01213                 uiItemEnumR(column, item[i].name, ICON_NONE, ptr, propname, item[i].value);
01214             }
01215             else {
01216                 if (item[i].name) {
01217                     if (i != 0) {
01218                         column = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
01219                         /* inconsistent, but menus with labels do not look good flipped */
01220                         block->flag |= UI_BLOCK_NO_FLIP;
01221                     }
01222 
01223                     uiItemL(column, item[i].name, ICON_NONE);
01224                     bt = block->buttons.last;
01225                     bt->flag = UI_TEXT_LEFT;
01226                 }
01227                 else
01228                     uiItemS(column);
01229             }
01230         }
01231 
01232         if (free) {
01233             MEM_freeN(item);
01234         }
01235     }
01236 }
01237 
01238 /* Pointer RNA button with search */
01239 
01240 typedef struct CollItemSearch {
01241     struct CollItemSearch *next, *prev;
01242     char *name;
01243     int index;
01244     int iconid;
01245 } CollItemSearch;
01246 
01247 static int sort_search_items_list(void *a, void *b)
01248 {
01249     CollItemSearch *cis1 = (CollItemSearch *)a;
01250     CollItemSearch *cis2 = (CollItemSearch *)b;
01251     
01252     if (BLI_strcasecmp(cis1->name, cis2->name) > 0)
01253         return 1;
01254     else
01255         return 0;
01256 }
01257 
01258 static void rna_search_cb(const struct bContext *C, void *arg_but, const char *str, uiSearchItems *items)
01259 {
01260     uiBut *but = arg_but;
01261     char *name;
01262     int i = 0, iconid = 0, flag = RNA_property_flag(but->rnaprop);
01263     ListBase *items_list = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ListBase), "items_list");
01264     CollItemSearch *cis;
01265     const int skip_filter = !but->changed;
01266 
01267     /* build a temporary list of relevant items first */
01268     RNA_PROP_BEGIN(&but->rnasearchpoin, itemptr, but->rnasearchprop) {
01269         if (flag & PROP_ID_SELF_CHECK)
01270             if (itemptr.data == but->rnapoin.id.data)
01271                 continue;
01272 
01273         /* use filter */
01274         if (RNA_property_type(but->rnaprop) == PROP_POINTER) {
01275             if (RNA_property_pointer_poll(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, &itemptr) == 0)
01276                 continue;
01277         }
01278 
01279         if (itemptr.type && RNA_struct_is_ID(itemptr.type)) {
01280             ID *id = itemptr.data;
01281             char name_ui[MAX_ID_NAME];
01282 
01283 #if 0       /* this name is used for a string comparison and can't be modified, TODO */
01284             name_uiprefix_id(name_ui, id);
01285 #else
01286             BLI_strncpy(name_ui, id->name + 2, sizeof(name_ui));
01287 #endif
01288             name = BLI_strdup(name_ui);
01289             iconid = ui_id_icon_get((bContext *)C, id, 0);
01290         }
01291         else {
01292             name = RNA_struct_name_get_alloc(&itemptr, NULL, 0, NULL); /* could use the string length here */
01293             iconid = 0;
01294         }
01295 
01296         if (name) {
01297             if (skip_filter || BLI_strcasestr(name, str)) {
01298                 cis = MEM_callocN(sizeof(CollItemSearch), "CollectionItemSearch");
01299                 cis->name = MEM_dupallocN(name);
01300                 cis->index = i;
01301                 cis->iconid = iconid;
01302                 BLI_addtail(items_list, cis);
01303             }
01304             MEM_freeN(name);
01305         }           
01306 
01307         i++;
01308     }
01309     RNA_PROP_END;
01310     
01311     BLI_sortlist(items_list, sort_search_items_list);
01312     
01313     /* add search items from temporary list */
01314     for (cis = items_list->first; cis; cis = cis->next) {
01315         if (!uiSearchItemAdd(items, cis->name, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(cis->index), cis->iconid)) {
01316             break;
01317         }
01318     }
01319 
01320     for (cis = items_list->first; cis; cis = cis->next) {
01321         MEM_freeN(cis->name);
01322     }
01323     BLI_freelistN(items_list);
01324     MEM_freeN(items_list);
01325 }
01326 
01327 static void search_id_collection(StructRNA *ptype, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA **prop)
01328 {
01329     StructRNA *srna;
01330 
01331     /* look for collection property in Main */
01332     RNA_main_pointer_create(G.main, ptr);
01333 
01334     *prop = NULL;
01335 
01336     RNA_STRUCT_BEGIN(ptr, iprop) {
01337         /* if it's a collection and has same pointer type, we've got it */
01338         if (RNA_property_type(iprop) == PROP_COLLECTION) {
01339             srna = RNA_property_pointer_type(ptr, iprop);
01340 
01341             if (ptype == srna) {
01342                 *prop = iprop;
01343                 break;
01344             }
01345         }
01346     }
01347     RNA_STRUCT_END;
01348 }
01349 
01350 void ui_but_add_search(uiBut *but, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *prop, PointerRNA *searchptr, PropertyRNA *searchprop)
01351 {
01352     StructRNA *ptype;
01353     PointerRNA sptr;
01354 
01355     /* for ID's we do automatic lookup */
01356     if (!searchprop) {
01357         if (RNA_property_type(prop) == PROP_POINTER) {
01358             ptype = RNA_property_pointer_type(ptr, prop);
01359             search_id_collection(ptype, &sptr, &searchprop);
01360             searchptr = &sptr;
01361         }
01362     }
01363 
01364     /* turn button into search button */
01365     if (searchprop) {
01366         but->type = SEARCH_MENU;
01367         but->hardmax = MAX2(but->hardmax, 256);
01368         but->rnasearchpoin = *searchptr;
01369         but->rnasearchprop = searchprop;
01370         but->flag |= UI_ICON_LEFT | UI_TEXT_LEFT;
01371 
01372         uiButSetSearchFunc(but, rna_search_cb, but, NULL, NULL);
01373     }
01374 }
01375 
01376 void uiItemPointerR(uiLayout *layout, struct PointerRNA *ptr, const char *propname, struct PointerRNA *searchptr, const char *searchpropname, const char *name, int icon)
01377 {
01378     PropertyRNA *prop, *searchprop;
01379     PropertyType type;
01380     uiBut *but;
01381     uiBlock *block;
01382     StructRNA *icontype;
01383     int w, h;
01384     
01385     /* validate arguments */
01386     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, propname);
01387 
01388     if (!prop) {
01389         RNA_warning("property not found: %s.%s", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
01390         return;
01391     }
01392     
01393     type = RNA_property_type(prop);
01394     if (!ELEM(type, PROP_POINTER, PROP_STRING)) {
01395         RNA_warning("Property %s must be a pointer or string", propname);
01396         return;
01397     }
01398 
01399     searchprop = RNA_struct_find_property(searchptr, searchpropname);
01400 
01401 
01402     if (!searchprop) {
01403         RNA_warning("search collection property not found: %s.%s", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), searchpropname);
01404         return;
01405     }
01406     else if (RNA_property_type(searchprop) != PROP_COLLECTION) {
01407         RNA_warning("search collection property is not a collection type: %s.%s", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), searchpropname);
01408         return;
01409     }
01410 
01411     /* get icon & name */
01412     if (icon == ICON_NONE) {
01413         if (type == PROP_POINTER)
01414             icontype = RNA_property_pointer_type(ptr, prop);
01415         else
01416             icontype = RNA_property_pointer_type(searchptr, searchprop);
01417 
01418         icon = RNA_struct_ui_icon(icontype);
01419     }
01420     if (!name)
01421         name = RNA_property_ui_name(prop);
01422 
01423     /* create button */
01424     block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
01425 
01426     ui_item_rna_size(layout, name, icon, ptr, prop, 0, 0, &w, &h);
01427     but = ui_item_with_label(layout, block, name, icon, ptr, prop, 0, 0, 0, w, h, 0);
01428 
01429     ui_but_add_search(but, ptr, prop, searchptr, searchprop);
01430 }
01431 
01432 /* menu item */
01433 static void ui_item_menutype_func(bContext *C, uiLayout *layout, void *arg_mt)
01434 {
01435     MenuType *mt = (MenuType *)arg_mt;
01436     Menu menu = {NULL};
01437 
01438     menu.type = mt;
01439     menu.layout = layout;
01440     mt->draw(C, &menu);
01441 }
01442 
01443 static void ui_item_menu(uiLayout *layout, const char *name, int icon, uiMenuCreateFunc func, void *arg, void *argN, const char *tip)
01444 {
01445     uiBlock *block = layout->root->block;
01446     uiBut *but;
01447     int w, h;
01448 
01449     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, layout);
01450 
01451     if (layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_HEADER)
01452         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSS);
01453 
01454     if (!name)
01455         name = "";
01456     if (layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_MENU && !icon)
01457         icon = ICON_BLANK1;
01458 
01459     w = ui_text_icon_width(layout, name, icon, 1);
01460     h = UI_UNIT_Y;
01461 
01462     if (layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_HEADER) /* ugly .. */
01463         w -= 10;
01464 
01465     if (name[0] && icon)
01466         but = uiDefIconTextMenuBut(block, func, arg, icon, name, 0, 0, w, h, tip);
01467     else if (icon)
01468         but = uiDefIconMenuBut(block, func, arg, icon, 0, 0, w, h, tip);
01469     else
01470         but = uiDefMenuBut(block, func, arg, name, 0, 0, w, h, tip);
01471 
01472     if (argN) { /* ugly .. */
01473         but->poin = (char *)but;
01474         but->func_argN = argN;
01475     }
01476 
01477     if (layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_HEADER)
01478         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSS);
01479     else if (ELEM(layout->root->type, UI_LAYOUT_PANEL, UI_LAYOUT_TOOLBAR)) {
01480         but->type = MENU;
01481         but->flag |= UI_TEXT_LEFT;
01482     }
01483 }
01484 
01485 void uiItemM(uiLayout *layout, bContext *UNUSED(C), const char *menuname, const char *name, int icon)
01486 {
01487     MenuType *mt;
01488 
01489     mt = WM_menutype_find(menuname, FALSE);
01490 
01491     if (mt == NULL) {
01492         RNA_warning("not found %s", menuname);
01493         return;
01494     }
01495 
01496     if (!name) {
01497         name = IFACE_(mt->label);
01498     }
01499 
01500     if (layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_MENU && !icon)
01501         icon = ICON_BLANK1;
01502 
01503     ui_item_menu(layout, name, icon, ui_item_menutype_func, mt, NULL, TIP_(mt->description));
01504 }

01506 /* label item */
01507 static uiBut *uiItemL_(uiLayout *layout, const char *name, int icon)
01508 {
01509     uiBlock *block = layout->root->block;
01510     uiBut *but;
01511     int w;
01512 
01513     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, layout);
01514 
01515     if (!name)
01516         name = "";
01517     if (layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_MENU && !icon)
01518         icon = ICON_BLANK1;
01519 
01520     w = ui_text_icon_width(layout, name, icon, 0);
01521 
01522     if (icon && name[0])
01523         but = uiDefIconTextBut(block, LABEL, 0, icon, name, 0, 0, w, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
01524     else if (icon)
01525         but = uiDefIconBut(block, LABEL, 0, icon, 0, 0, w, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
01526     else
01527         but = uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, name, 0, 0, w, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
01528     
01529     return but;
01530 }

01535 }

01566     else if (icon)

01589 
01590 typedef struct MenuItemLevel {
01591     int opcontext;
01592     /* don't use pointers to the strings because python can dynamically
01593      * allocate strings and free before the menu draws, see [#27304] */
01594     char opname[OP_MAX_TYPENAME];
01595     char propname[MAX_IDPROP_NAME];
01596     PointerRNA rnapoin;
01597 } MenuItemLevel;
01598 
01599 static void menu_item_enum_opname_menu(bContext *UNUSED(C), uiLayout *layout, void *arg)
01600 {
01601     MenuItemLevel *lvl = (MenuItemLevel *)(((uiBut *)arg)->func_argN);
01602 
01603     uiLayoutSetOperatorContext(layout, lvl->opcontext);
01604     uiItemsEnumO(layout, lvl->opname, lvl->propname);
01605 }
01606 
01607 void uiItemMenuEnumO(uiLayout *layout, const char *opname, const char *propname, const char *name, int icon)
01608 {
01609     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find(opname, 0); /* print error next */
01610     MenuItemLevel *lvl;
01611 
01612     UI_OPERATOR_ERROR_RET(ot, opname, return );
01613 
01614     if (!ot->srna) {
01615         ui_item_disabled(layout, opname);
01616         RNA_warning("operator missing srna '%s'", opname);
01617         return;
01618     }
01619 
01620     if (!name)
01621         name = RNA_struct_ui_name(ot->srna);
01622     if (layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_MENU && !icon)
01623         icon = ICON_BLANK1;
01624 
01625     lvl = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MenuItemLevel), "MenuItemLevel");
01626     BLI_strncpy(lvl->opname, opname, sizeof(lvl->opname));
01627     BLI_strncpy(lvl->propname, propname, sizeof(lvl->propname));
01628     lvl->opcontext = layout->root->opcontext;
01629 
01630     ui_item_menu(layout, name, icon, menu_item_enum_opname_menu, NULL, lvl, RNA_struct_ui_description(ot->srna));
01631 }
01632 
01633 static void menu_item_enum_rna_menu(bContext *UNUSED(C), uiLayout *layout, void *arg)
01634 {
01635     MenuItemLevel *lvl = (MenuItemLevel *)(((uiBut *)arg)->func_argN);
01636 
01637     uiLayoutSetOperatorContext(layout, lvl->opcontext);
01638     uiItemsEnumR(layout, &lvl->rnapoin, lvl->propname);
01639 }
01640 
01641 void uiItemMenuEnumR(uiLayout *layout, struct PointerRNA *ptr, const char *propname, const char *name, int icon)
01642 {
01643     MenuItemLevel *lvl;
01644     PropertyRNA *prop;
01645 
01646     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, propname);
01647     if (!prop) {
01648         ui_item_disabled(layout, propname);
01649         RNA_warning("property not found: %s.%s", RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
01650         return;
01651     }
01652 
01653     if (!name)
01654         name = RNA_property_ui_name(prop);
01655     if (layout->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_MENU && !icon)
01656         icon = ICON_BLANK1;
01657 
01658     lvl = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MenuItemLevel), "MenuItemLevel");
01659     lvl->rnapoin = *ptr;
01660     BLI_strncpy(lvl->propname, propname, sizeof(lvl->propname));
01661     lvl->opcontext = layout->root->opcontext;
01662 
01663     ui_item_menu(layout, name, icon, menu_item_enum_rna_menu, NULL, lvl, RNA_property_description(prop));
01664 }
01665 
01666 /**************************** Layout Items ***************************/
01667 
01668 /* single-row layout */
01669 static void ui_litem_estimate_row(uiLayout *litem)
01670 {
01671     uiItem *item;
01672     int itemw, itemh;
01673 
01674     litem->w = 0;
01675     litem->h = 0;
01676 
01677     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
01678         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
01679 
01680         litem->w += itemw;
01681         litem->h = MAX2(itemh, litem->h);
01682 
01683         if (item->next)
01684             litem->w += litem->space;
01685     }
01686 }
01687 
01688 static int ui_litem_min_width(int itemw)
01689 {
01690     return MIN2(2 * UI_UNIT_X, itemw);
01691 }
01692 
01693 static void ui_litem_layout_row(uiLayout *litem)
01694 {
01695     uiItem *item;
01696     int x, y, w, tot, totw, neww, itemw, minw, itemh, offset;
01697     int fixedw, freew, fixedx, freex, flag = 0, lastw = 0;
01698 
01699     /* x= litem->x; */ /* UNUSED */
01700     y = litem->y;
01701     w = litem->w;
01702     totw = 0;
01703     tot = 0;
01704 
01705     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
01706         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
01707         totw += itemw;
01708         tot++;
01709     }
01710 
01711     if (totw == 0)
01712         return;
01713     
01714     if (w != 0)
01715         w -= (tot - 1) * litem->space;
01716     fixedw = 0;
01717 
01718     /* keep clamping items to fixed minimum size until all are done */
01719     do {
01720         freew = 0;
01721         x = 0;
01722         flag = 0;
01723 
01724         for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
01725             if (item->flag)
01726                 continue;
01727 
01728             ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
01729             minw = ui_litem_min_width(itemw);
01730 
01731             if (w - lastw > 0)
01732                 neww = ui_item_fit(itemw, x, totw, w - lastw, !item->next, litem->alignment, NULL);
01733             else
01734                 neww = 0;  /* no space left, all will need clamping to minimum size */
01735 
01736             x += neww;
01737 
01738             if ((neww < minw || itemw == minw) && w != 0) {
01739                 /* fixed size */
01740                 item->flag = 1;
01741                 fixedw += minw;
01742                 flag = 1;
01743                 totw -= itemw;
01744             }
01745             else {
01746                 /* keep free size */
01747                 item->flag = 0;
01748                 freew += itemw;
01749             }
01750         }
01751 
01752         lastw = fixedw;
01753     } while (flag);
01754 
01755     freex = 0;
01756     fixedx = 0;
01757     x = litem->x;
01758 
01759     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
01760         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
01761         minw = ui_litem_min_width(itemw);
01762 
01763         if (item->flag) {
01764             /* fixed minimum size items */
01765             itemw = ui_item_fit(minw, fixedx, fixedw, MIN2(w, fixedw), !item->next, litem->alignment, NULL);
01766             fixedx += itemw;
01767         }
01768         else {
01769             /* free size item */
01770             itemw = ui_item_fit(itemw, freex, freew, w - fixedw, !item->next, litem->alignment, NULL);
01771             freex += itemw;
01772         }
01773 
01774         /* align right/center */
01775         offset = 0;
01776         if (litem->alignment == UI_LAYOUT_ALIGN_RIGHT) {
01777             if (freew > 0 && freew < w - fixedw)
01778                 offset = (w - fixedw) - freew;
01779         }
01780         else if (litem->alignment == UI_LAYOUT_ALIGN_CENTER) {
01781             if (freew > 0 && freew < w - fixedw)
01782                 offset = ((w - fixedw) - freew) / 2;
01783         }
01784 
01785         /* position item */
01786         ui_item_position(item, x + offset, y - itemh, itemw, itemh);
01787 
01788         x += itemw;
01789         if (item->next)
01790             x += litem->space;
01791     }
01792 
01793     litem->w = x - litem->x;
01794     litem->h = litem->y - y;
01795     litem->x = x;
01796     litem->y = y;
01797 }
01798 
01799 /* single-column layout */
01800 static void ui_litem_estimate_column(uiLayout *litem)
01801 {
01802     uiItem *item;
01803     int itemw, itemh;
01804 
01805     litem->w = 0;
01806     litem->h = 0;
01807 
01808     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
01809         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
01810 
01811         litem->w = MAX2(litem->w, itemw);
01812         litem->h += itemh;
01813 
01814         if (item->next)
01815             litem->h += litem->space;
01816     }
01817 }
01818 
01819 static void ui_litem_layout_column(uiLayout *litem)
01820 {
01821     uiItem *item;
01822     int itemh, x, y;
01823 
01824     x = litem->x;
01825     y = litem->y;
01826 
01827     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
01828         ui_item_size(item, NULL, &itemh);
01829 
01830         y -= itemh;
01831         ui_item_position(item, x, y, litem->w, itemh);
01832 
01833         if (item->next)
01834             y -= litem->space;
01835     }
01836 
01837     litem->h = litem->y - y;
01838     litem->x = x;
01839     litem->y = y;
01840 }
01841 
01842 /* root layout */
01843 static void ui_litem_estimate_root(uiLayout *UNUSED(litem))
01844 {
01845     /* nothing to do */
01846 }
01847 
01848 static void ui_litem_layout_root(uiLayout *litem)
01849 {
01850     if (litem->root->type == UI_LAYOUT_HEADER)
01851         ui_litem_layout_row(litem);
01852     else
01853         ui_litem_layout_column(litem);
01854 }
01855 
01856 /* box layout */
01857 static void ui_litem_estimate_box(uiLayout *litem)
01858 {
01859     uiStyle *style = litem->root->style;
01860 
01861     ui_litem_estimate_column(litem);
01862     litem->w += 2 * style->boxspace;
01863     litem->h += style->boxspace;
01864 }
01865 
01866 static void ui_litem_layout_box(uiLayout *litem)
01867 {
01868     uiLayoutItemBx *box = (uiLayoutItemBx *)litem;
01869     uiStyle *style = litem->root->style;
01870     uiBut *but;
01871     int w, h;
01872 
01873     w = litem->w;
01874     h = litem->h;
01875 
01876     litem->x += style->boxspace;
01877 
01878     if (w != 0) litem->w -= 2 * style->boxspace;
01879     if (h != 0) litem->h -= 2 * style->boxspace;
01880 
01881     ui_litem_layout_column(litem);
01882 
01883     litem->x -= style->boxspace;
01884     litem->y -= style->boxspace;
01885 
01886     if (w != 0) litem->w += 2 * style->boxspace;
01887     if (h != 0) litem->h += style->boxspace;
01888 
01889     /* roundbox around the sublayout */
01890     but = box->roundbox;
01891     but->x1 = litem->x;
01892     but->y1 = litem->y;
01893     but->x2 = litem->x + litem->w;
01894     but->y2 = litem->y + litem->h;
01895 }
01896 
01897 /* multi-column layout, automatically flowing to the next */
01898 static void ui_litem_estimate_column_flow(uiLayout *litem)
01899 {
01900     uiStyle *style = litem->root->style;
01901     uiLayoutItemFlow *flow = (uiLayoutItemFlow *)litem;
01902     uiItem *item;
01903     int col, x, y, emh, emy, miny, itemw, itemh, maxw = 0;
01904     int toth, totitem;
01905 
01906     /* compute max needed width and total height */
01907     toth = 0;
01908     totitem = 0;
01909     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
01910         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
01911         maxw = MAX2(maxw, itemw);
01912         toth += itemh;
01913         totitem++;
01914     }
01915 
01916     if (flow->number <= 0) {
01917         /* auto compute number of columns, not very good */
01918         if (maxw == 0) {
01919             flow->totcol = 1;
01920             return;
01921         }
01922 
01923         flow->totcol = MAX2(litem->root->emw / maxw, 1);
01924         flow->totcol = MIN2(flow->totcol, totitem);
01925     }
01926     else
01927         flow->totcol = flow->number;
01928 
01929     /* compute sizes */
01930     x = 0;
01931     y = 0;
01932     emy = 0;
01933     miny = 0;
01934 
01935     maxw = 0;
01936     emh = toth / flow->totcol;
01937 
01938     /* create column per column */
01939     col = 0;
01940     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
01941         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
01942 
01943         y -= itemh + style->buttonspacey;
01944         miny = MIN2(miny, y);
01945         emy -= itemh;
01946         maxw = MAX2(itemw, maxw);
01947 
01948         /* decide to go to next one */
01949         if (col < flow->totcol - 1 && emy <= -emh) {
01950             x += maxw + litem->space;
01951             maxw = 0;
01952             y = 0;
01953             col++;
01954         }
01955     }
01956 
01957     litem->w = x;
01958     litem->h = litem->y - miny;
01959 }
01960 
01961 static void ui_litem_layout_column_flow(uiLayout *litem)
01962 {
01963     uiStyle *style = litem->root->style;
01964     uiLayoutItemFlow *flow = (uiLayoutItemFlow *)litem;
01965     uiItem *item;
01966     int col, x, y, w, emh, emy, miny, itemw, itemh;
01967     int toth, totitem, offset;
01968 
01969     /* compute max needed width and total height */
01970     toth = 0;
01971     totitem = 0;
01972     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
01973         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
01974         toth += itemh;
01975         totitem++;
01976     }
01977 
01978     /* compute sizes */
01979     x = litem->x;
01980     y = litem->y;
01981     emy = 0;
01982     miny = 0;
01983 
01984     w = litem->w - (flow->totcol - 1) * style->columnspace;
01985     emh = toth / flow->totcol;
01986 
01987     /* create column per column */
01988     col = 0;
01989     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
01990         ui_item_size(item, NULL, &itemh);
01991         itemw = ui_item_fit(1, x - litem->x, flow->totcol, w, col == flow->totcol - 1, litem->alignment, &offset);
01992     
01993         y -= itemh;
01994         emy -= itemh;
01995         ui_item_position(item, x + offset, y, itemw, itemh);
01996         y -= style->buttonspacey;
01997         miny = MIN2(miny, y);
01998 
01999         /* decide to go to next one */
02000         if (col < flow->totcol - 1 && emy <= -emh) {
02001             x += itemw + style->columnspace;
02002             y = litem->y;
02003             col++;
02004         }
02005     }
02006 
02007     litem->h = litem->y - miny;
02008     litem->x = x;
02009     litem->y = miny;
02010 }
02011 
02012 /* free layout */
02013 static void ui_litem_estimate_absolute(uiLayout *litem)
02014 {
02015     uiItem *item;
02016     int itemx, itemy, itemw, itemh, minx, miny;
02017 
02018     minx = 1e6;
02019     miny = 1e6;
02020     litem->w = 0;
02021     litem->h = 0;
02022 
02023     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
02024         ui_item_offset(item, &itemx, &itemy);
02025         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
02026 
02027         minx = MIN2(minx, itemx);
02028         miny = MIN2(miny, itemy);
02029 
02030         litem->w = MAX2(litem->w, itemx + itemw);
02031         litem->h = MAX2(litem->h, itemy + itemh);
02032     }
02033 
02034     litem->w -= minx;
02035     litem->h -= miny;
02036 }
02037 
02038 static void ui_litem_layout_absolute(uiLayout *litem)
02039 {
02040     uiItem *item;
02041     float scalex = 1.0f, scaley = 1.0f;
02042     int x, y, newx, newy, itemx, itemy, itemh, itemw, minx, miny, totw, toth;
02043 
02044     minx = 1e6;
02045     miny = 1e6;
02046     totw = 0;
02047     toth = 0;
02048 
02049     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
02050         ui_item_offset(item, &itemx, &itemy);
02051         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
02052 
02053         minx = MIN2(minx, itemx);
02054         miny = MIN2(miny, itemy);
02055 
02056         totw = MAX2(totw, itemx + itemw);
02057         toth = MAX2(toth, itemy + itemh);
02058     }
02059 
02060     totw -= minx;
02061     toth -= miny;
02062 
02063     if (litem->w && totw > 0)
02064         scalex = (float)litem->w / (float)totw;
02065     if (litem->h && toth > 0)
02066         scaley = (float)litem->h / (float)toth;
02067     
02068     x = litem->x;
02069     y = litem->y - scaley * toth;
02070 
02071     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
02072         ui_item_offset(item, &itemx, &itemy);
02073         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
02074 
02075         if (scalex != 1.0f) {
02076             newx = (itemx - minx) * scalex;
02077             itemw = (itemx - minx + itemw) * scalex - newx;
02078             itemx = minx + newx;
02079         }
02080 
02081         if (scaley != 1.0f) {
02082             newy = (itemy - miny) * scaley;
02083             itemh = (itemy - miny + itemh) * scaley - newy;
02084             itemy = miny + newy;
02085         }
02086 
02087         ui_item_position(item, x + itemx - minx, y + itemy - miny, itemw, itemh);
02088     }
02089 
02090     litem->w = scalex * totw;
02091     litem->h = litem->y - y;
02092     litem->x = x + litem->w;
02093     litem->y = y;
02094 }
02095 
02096 /* split layout */
02097 static void ui_litem_estimate_split(uiLayout *litem)
02098 {
02099     ui_litem_estimate_row(litem);
02100 }
02101 
02102 static void ui_litem_layout_split(uiLayout *litem)
02103 {
02104     uiLayoutItemSplit *split = (uiLayoutItemSplit *)litem;
02105     uiItem *item;
02106     float percentage;
02107     const int tot = BLI_countlist(&litem->items);
02108     int itemh, x, y, w, colw = 0;
02109 
02110     if (tot == 0)
02111         return;
02112 
02113     x = litem->x;
02114     y = litem->y;
02115 
02116     percentage = (split->percentage == 0.0f) ? 1.0f / (float)tot : split->percentage;
02117     
02118     w = (litem->w - (tot - 1) * litem->space);
02119     colw = w * percentage;
02120     colw = MAX2(colw, 0);
02121 
02122     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
02123         ui_item_size(item, NULL, &itemh);
02124 
02125         ui_item_position(item, x, y - itemh, colw, itemh);
02126         x += colw;
02127 
02128         if (item->next) {
02129             colw = (w - (int)(w * percentage)) / (tot - 1);
02130             colw = MAX2(colw, 0);
02131 
02132             x += litem->space;
02133         }
02134     }
02135 
02136     litem->w = x - litem->x;
02137     litem->h = litem->y - y;
02138     litem->x = x;
02139     litem->y = y;
02140 }
02141 
02142 /* overlap layout */
02143 static void ui_litem_estimate_overlap(uiLayout *litem)
02144 {
02145     uiItem *item;
02146     int itemw, itemh;
02147 
02148     litem->w = 0;
02149     litem->h = 0;
02150 
02151     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
02152         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
02153 
02154         litem->w = MAX2(itemw, litem->w);
02155         litem->h = MAX2(itemh, litem->h);
02156     }
02157 }
02158 
02159 static void ui_litem_layout_overlap(uiLayout *litem)
02160 {
02161     uiItem *item;
02162     int itemw, itemh, x, y;
02163 
02164     x = litem->x;
02165     y = litem->y;
02166 
02167     for (item = litem->items.first; item; item = item->next) {
02168         ui_item_size(item, &itemw, &itemh);
02169         ui_item_position(item, x, y - itemh, litem->w, itemh);
02170 
02171         litem->h = MAX2(litem->h, itemh);
02172     }
02173 
02174     litem->x = x;
02175     litem->y = y - litem->h;
02176 }
02177 
02178 /* layout create functions */
02179 uiLayout *uiLayoutRow(uiLayout *layout, int align)
02180 {
02181     uiLayout *litem;
02182 
02183     litem = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiLayout), "uiLayoutRow");
02184     litem->item.type = ITEM_LAYOUT_ROW;
02185     litem->root = layout->root;
02186     litem->align = align;
02187     litem->active = 1;
02188     litem->enabled = 1;
02189     litem->context = layout->context;
02190     litem->space = (align) ? 0 : layout->root->style->buttonspacex;
02191     litem->w = layout->w;
02192     BLI_addtail(&layout->items, litem);
02193 
02194     uiBlockSetCurLayout(layout->root->block, litem);
02195 
02196     return litem;
02197 }

02205     litem->root = layout->root;

02211     litem->w = layout->w;

02240 static uiLayoutItemBx *ui_layout_box(uiLayout *layout, int type)

02243

02246     box->litem.root = layout->root;
02247     box->litem.active = 1;
02248     box->litem.enabled = 1;
02249     box->litem.context = layout->context;
02250     box->litem.space = layout->root->style->columnspace;
02251     box->litem.w = layout->w;
02252     BLI_addtail(&layout->items, box);
02253 
02254     uiBlockSetCurLayout(layout->root->block, &box->litem);
02255 
02256     box->roundbox = uiDefBut(layout->root->block, type, 0, "", 0, 0, 0, 0, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
02257 
02258     return box;
02259 }

02419 
02420 /********************** Layout *******************/
02421 
02422 static void ui_item_scale(uiLayout *litem, float scale[2])
02423 {
02424     uiItem *item;
02425     int x, y, w, h;
02426 
02427     for (item = litem->items.last; item; item = item->prev) {
02428         ui_item_size(item, &w, &h);
02429         ui_item_offset(item, &x, &y);
02430 
02431         if (scale[0] != 0.0f) {
02432             x *= scale[0];
02433             w *= scale[0];
02434         }
02435 
02436         if (scale[1] != 0.0f) {
02437             y *= scale[1];
02438             h *= scale[1];
02439         }
02440 
02441         ui_item_position(item, x, y, w, h);
02442     }
02443 }
02444 
02445 static void ui_item_estimate(uiItem *item)
02446 {
02447     uiItem *subitem;
02448 
02449     if (item->type != ITEM_BUTTON) {
02450         uiLayout *litem = (uiLayout *)item;
02451 
02452         for (subitem = litem->items.first; subitem; subitem = subitem->next)
02453             ui_item_estimate(subitem);
02454 
02455         if (litem->items.first == NULL)
02456             return;
02457 
02458         if (litem->scale[0] != 0.0f || litem->scale[1] != 0.0f)
02459             ui_item_scale(litem, litem->scale);
02460 
02461         switch (litem->item.type) {
02462             case ITEM_LAYOUT_COLUMN:
02463                 ui_litem_estimate_column(litem);
02464                 break;
02465             case ITEM_LAYOUT_COLUMN_FLOW:
02466                 ui_litem_estimate_column_flow(litem);
02467                 break;
02468             case ITEM_LAYOUT_ROW:
02469                 ui_litem_estimate_row(litem);
02470                 break;
02471             case ITEM_LAYOUT_BOX:
02472                 ui_litem_estimate_box(litem);
02473                 break;
02474             case ITEM_LAYOUT_ROOT:
02475                 ui_litem_estimate_root(litem);
02476                 break;
02477             case ITEM_LAYOUT_ABSOLUTE:
02478                 ui_litem_estimate_absolute(litem);
02479                 break;
02480             case ITEM_LAYOUT_SPLIT:
02481                 ui_litem_estimate_split(litem);
02482                 break;
02483             case ITEM_LAYOUT_OVERLAP:
02484                 ui_litem_estimate_overlap(litem);
02485                 break;
02486             default:
02487                 break;
02488         }
02489     }
02490 }
02491 
02492 static void ui_item_align(uiLayout *litem, short nr)
02493 {
02494     uiItem *item;
02495     uiButtonItem *bitem;
02496     uiLayoutItemBx *box;
02497 
02498     for (item = litem->items.last; item; item = item->prev) {
02499         if (item->type == ITEM_BUTTON) {
02500             bitem = (uiButtonItem *)item;
02501             if (ui_but_can_align(bitem->but))
02502                 if (!bitem->but->alignnr)
02503                     bitem->but->alignnr = nr;
02504         }
02505         else if (item->type == ITEM_LAYOUT_ABSOLUTE) ;
02506         else if (item->type == ITEM_LAYOUT_OVERLAP) ;
02507         else if (item->type == ITEM_LAYOUT_BOX) {
02508             box = (uiLayoutItemBx *)item;
02509             box->roundbox->alignnr = nr;
02510             BLI_remlink(&litem->root->block->buttons, box->roundbox);
02511             BLI_addhead(&litem->root->block->buttons, box->roundbox);
02512         }
02513         else
02514             ui_item_align((uiLayout *)item, nr);
02515     }
02516 }
02517 
02518 static void ui_item_flag(uiLayout *litem, int flag)
02519 {
02520     uiItem *item;
02521     uiButtonItem *bitem;
02522 
02523     for (item = litem->items.last; item; item = item->prev) {
02524         if (item->type == ITEM_BUTTON) {
02525             bitem = (uiButtonItem *)item;
02526             bitem->but->flag |= flag;
02527         }
02528         else
02529             ui_item_flag((uiLayout *)item, flag);
02530     }
02531 }
02532 
02533 static void ui_item_layout(uiItem *item)
02534 {
02535     uiItem *subitem;
02536 
02537     if (item->type != ITEM_BUTTON) {
02538         uiLayout *litem = (uiLayout *)item;
02539 
02540         if (litem->items.first == NULL)
02541             return;
02542 
02543         if (litem->align)
02544             ui_item_align(litem, ++litem->root->block->alignnr);
02545         if (!litem->active)
02546             ui_item_flag(litem, UI_BUT_INACTIVE);
02547         if (!litem->enabled)
02548             ui_item_flag(litem, UI_BUT_DISABLED);
02549 
02550         switch (litem->item.type) {
02551             case ITEM_LAYOUT_COLUMN:
02552                 ui_litem_layout_column(litem);
02553                 break;
02554             case ITEM_LAYOUT_COLUMN_FLOW:
02555                 ui_litem_layout_column_flow(litem);
02556                 break;
02557             case ITEM_LAYOUT_ROW:
02558                 ui_litem_layout_row(litem);
02559                 break;
02560             case ITEM_LAYOUT_BOX:
02561                 ui_litem_layout_box(litem);
02562                 break;
02563             case ITEM_LAYOUT_ROOT:
02564                 ui_litem_layout_root(litem);
02565                 break;
02566             case ITEM_LAYOUT_ABSOLUTE:
02567                 ui_litem_layout_absolute(litem);
02568                 break;
02569             case ITEM_LAYOUT_SPLIT:
02570                 ui_litem_layout_split(litem);
02571                 break;
02572             case ITEM_LAYOUT_OVERLAP:
02573                 ui_litem_layout_overlap(litem);
02574                 break;
02575             default:
02576                 break;
02577         }
02578 
02579         for (subitem = litem->items.first; subitem; subitem = subitem->next)
02580             ui_item_layout(subitem);
02581     }
02582 }
02583 
02584 static void ui_layout_end(uiBlock *block, uiLayout *layout, int *x, int *y)
02585 {
02586     if (layout->root->handlefunc)
02587         uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, layout->root->handlefunc, layout->root->argv);
02588 
02589     ui_item_estimate(&layout->item);
02590     ui_item_layout(&layout->item);
02591 
02592     if (x) *x = layout->x;
02593     if (y) *y = layout->y;
02594 }
02595 
02596 static void ui_layout_free(uiLayout *layout)
02597 {
02598     uiItem *item, *next;
02599 
02600     for (item = layout->items.first; item; item = next) {
02601         next = item->next;
02602 
02603         if (item->type == ITEM_BUTTON)
02604             MEM_freeN(item);
02605         else
02606             ui_layout_free((uiLayout *)item);
02607     }
02608 
02609     MEM_freeN(layout);
02610 }
02611 
02612 uiLayout *uiBlockLayout(uiBlock *block, int dir, int type, int x, int y, int size, int em, uiStyle *style)
02613 {
02614     uiLayout *layout;
02615     uiLayoutRoot *root;
02616 
02617     root = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiLayoutRoot), "uiLayoutRoot");
02618     root->type = type;
02619     root->style = style;
02620     root->block = block;
02621     root->opcontext = WM_OP_INVOKE_REGION_WIN;
02622 
02623     layout = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiLayout), "uiLayout");
02624     layout->item.type = ITEM_LAYOUT_ROOT;
02625 
02626     layout->x = x;
02627     layout->y = y;
02628     layout->root = root;
02629     layout->space = style->templatespace;
02630     layout->active = 1;
02631     layout->enabled = 1;
02632     layout->context = NULL;
02633 
02634     if (type == UI_LAYOUT_MENU)
02635         layout->space = 0;
02636 
02637     if (dir == UI_LAYOUT_HORIZONTAL) {
02638         layout->h = size;
02639         layout->root->emh = em * UI_UNIT_Y;
02640     }
02641     else {
02642         layout->w = size;
02643         layout->root->emw = em * UI_UNIT_X;
02644     }
02645 
02646     block->curlayout = layout;
02647     root->layout = layout;
02648     BLI_addtail(&block->layouts, root);
02649     
02650     return layout;
02651 }
02652 
02653 uiBlock *uiLayoutGetBlock(uiLayout *layout)
02654 {
02655     return layout->root->block;
02656 }
02657 
02658 int uiLayoutGetOperatorContext(uiLayout *layout)
02659 {
02660     return layout->root->opcontext;
02661 }
02662 
02663 
02664 void uiBlockSetCurLayout(uiBlock *block, uiLayout *layout)
02665 {
02666     block->curlayout = layout;
02667 }
02668 
02669 void ui_layout_add_but(uiLayout *layout, uiBut *but)
02670 {
02671     uiButtonItem *bitem;
02672     
02673     bitem = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiButtonItem), "uiButtonItem");
02674     bitem->item.type = ITEM_BUTTON;
02675     bitem->but = but;
02676     BLI_addtail(&layout->items, bitem);
02677 
02678     if (layout->context) {
02679         but->context = layout->context;
02680         but->context->used = 1;
02681     }
02682 }
02683 
02684 void uiLayoutSetOperatorContext(uiLayout *layout, int opcontext)
02685 {
02686     layout->root->opcontext = opcontext;
02687 }
02688 
02689 void uiLayoutSetFunc(uiLayout *layout, uiMenuHandleFunc handlefunc, void *argv)
02690 {
02691     layout->root->handlefunc = handlefunc;
02692     layout->root->argv = argv;
02693 }
02694 
02695 void uiBlockLayoutResolve(uiBlock *block, int *x, int *y)
02696 {
02697     uiLayoutRoot *root;
02698 
02699     if (x) *x = 0;
02700     if (y) *y = 0;
02701 
02702     block->curlayout = NULL;
02703 
02704     for (root = block->layouts.first; root; root = root->next) {
02705         /* NULL in advance so we don't interfere when adding button */
02706         ui_layout_end(block, root->layout, x, y);
02707         ui_layout_free(root->layout);
02708     }
02709 
02710     BLI_freelistN(&block->layouts);
02711 
02712     /* XXX silly trick, interface_templates.c doesn't get linked
02713      * because it's not used by other files in this module? */
02714     {
02715         UI_template_fix_linking();
02716     }
02717 }
02718 
02719 void uiLayoutSetContextPointer(uiLayout *layout, const char *name, PointerRNA *ptr)
02720 {
02721     uiBlock *block = layout->root->block;
02722     layout->context = CTX_store_add(&block->contexts, name, ptr);
02723 }
02724 
02725 void uiLayoutContextCopy(uiLayout *layout, bContextStore *context)
02726 {
02727     uiBlock *block= layout->root->block;
02728     layout->context= CTX_store_add_all(&block->contexts, context);
02729 }
