02731 
02732 /* introspect funcs */
02733 #include "BLI_dynstr.h"
02734 
02735 static void ui_intro_button(DynStr *ds, uiButtonItem *bitem)
02736 {
02737     uiBut *but = bitem->but;
02738     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "'type':%d, ", but->type); /* see ~ UI_interface.h:200 */
02739     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "'draw_string':'''%s''', ", but->drawstr);
02740     BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "'tip':'''%s''', ", but->tip ? but->tip : ""); // not exactly needed, rna has this
02741 
02742     if (but->optype) {
02743         char *opstr = WM_operator_pystring(but->block->evil_C, but->optype, but->opptr, 0);
02744         BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "'operator':'''%s''', ", opstr ? opstr : "");
02745         MEM_freeN(opstr);
02746     }
02747 
02748     if (but->rnaprop) {
02749         BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "'rna':'%s.%s[%d]', ", RNA_struct_identifier(but->rnapoin.type), RNA_property_identifier(but->rnaprop), but->rnaindex);
02750     }
02751 
02752 }
02753 
02754 static void ui_intro_items(DynStr *ds, ListBase *lb)
02755 {
02756     uiItem *item;
02757 
02758     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "[");
02759 
02760     for (item = lb->first; item; item = item->next) {
02761 
02762         BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "{");
02763 
02764         /* could also use the INT but this is nicer*/
02765         switch (item->type) {
02766             case ITEM_BUTTON:             BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'type':'BUTTON', "); break;
02767             case ITEM_LAYOUT_ROW:         BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'type':'ROW', "); break;
02768             case ITEM_LAYOUT_COLUMN:      BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'type':'COLUMN', "); break;
02769             case ITEM_LAYOUT_COLUMN_FLOW: BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'type':'COLUMN_FLOW', "); break;
02770             case ITEM_LAYOUT_ROW_FLOW:    BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'type':'ROW_FLOW', "); break;
02771             case ITEM_LAYOUT_BOX:         BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'type':'BOX', "); break;
02772             case ITEM_LAYOUT_ABSOLUTE:    BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'type':'ABSOLUTE', "); break;
02773             case ITEM_LAYOUT_SPLIT:       BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'type':'SPLIT', "); break;
02774             case ITEM_LAYOUT_OVERLAP:     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'type':'OVERLAP', "); break;
02775             case ITEM_LAYOUT_ROOT:        BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'type':'ROOT', "); break;
02776             default:                      BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'type':'UNKNOWN', "); break;
02777         }
02778 
02779         switch (item->type) {
02780             case ITEM_BUTTON:
02781                 ui_intro_button(ds, (uiButtonItem *)item);
02782                 break;
02783             default:
02784                 BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "'items':");
02785                 ui_intro_items(ds, &((uiLayout *)item)->items);
02786                 break;
02787         }
02788 
02789         BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "}");
02790 
02791         if (item != lb->last)
02792             BLI_dynstr_append(ds, ", ");
02793     }
02794     BLI_dynstr_append(ds, "], ");
02795 }
02796 
02797 static void ui_intro_uiLayout(DynStr *ds, uiLayout *layout)
02798 {
02799     ui_intro_items(ds, &layout->items);
02800 }
02801 
02802 static char *str = NULL; // XXX, constant re-freeing, far from ideal.
02803 const char *uiLayoutIntrospect(uiLayout *layout)
02804 {
02805     DynStr *ds = BLI_dynstr_new();
02806 
02807     if (str) {
02808         MEM_freeN(str);
02809     }
02810 
02811     ui_intro_uiLayout(ds, layout);
02812 
02813     str = BLI_dynstr_get_cstring(ds);
02814     BLI_dynstr_free(ds);
02815 
02816     return str;
02817 }
02818 
02819 static void ui_layout_operator_buts__reset_cb(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *op_pt, void *UNUSED(arg_dummy2))
02820 {
02821     WM_operator_properties_reset((wmOperator *)op_pt);
02822 }
02823 
02824 /* this function does not initialize the layout, functions can be called on the layout before and after */
02825 void uiLayoutOperatorButs(const bContext *C, uiLayout *layout, wmOperator *op, int (*check_prop)(struct PointerRNA *, struct PropertyRNA *), const char label_align, const short flag)
02826 {
02827     if (!op->properties) {
02828         IDPropertyTemplate val = {0};
02829         op->properties = IDP_New(IDP_GROUP, &val, "wmOperatorProperties");
02830     }
02831 
02832     if (flag & UI_LAYOUT_OP_SHOW_TITLE) {
02833         uiItemL(layout, RNA_struct_ui_name(op->type->srna), ICON_NONE);
02834     }
02835 
02836     /* poll() on this operator may still fail, at the moment there is no nice feedback when this happens
02837      * just fails silently */
02838     if (!WM_operator_repeat_check(C, op)) {
02839         uiBlockSetButLock(uiLayoutGetBlock(layout), TRUE, "Operator cannot redo");
02840         uiItemL(layout, IFACE_("* Redo Unsupported *"), ICON_NONE); // XXX, could give some nicer feedback or not show redo panel at all?
02841     }
02842 
02843     /* menu */
02844     if (op->type->flag & OPTYPE_PRESET) {
02845         /* XXX, no simple way to get WM_MT_operator_presets.bl_label from python! Label remains the same always! */
02846         PointerRNA op_ptr;
02847         uiLayout *row;
02848 
02849         uiLayoutGetBlock(layout)->ui_operator = op;
02850 
02851         row = uiLayoutRow(layout, TRUE);
02852         uiItemM(row, (bContext *)C, "WM_MT_operator_presets", NULL, ICON_NONE);
02853 
02854         WM_operator_properties_create(&op_ptr, "WM_OT_operator_preset_add");
02855         RNA_string_set(&op_ptr, "operator", op->type->idname);
02856         op_ptr = uiItemFullO(row, "WM_OT_operator_preset_add", "", ICON_ZOOMIN, op_ptr.data, WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, 0);
02857 
02858         WM_operator_properties_create(&op_ptr, "WM_OT_operator_preset_add");
02859         RNA_string_set(&op_ptr, "operator", op->type->idname);
02860         RNA_boolean_set(&op_ptr, "remove_active", TRUE);
02861         op_ptr = uiItemFullO(row, "WM_OT_operator_preset_add", "", ICON_ZOOMOUT, op_ptr.data, WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, 0);
02862     }
02863 
02864     if (op->type->ui) {
02865         op->layout = layout;
02866         op->type->ui((bContext *)C, op);
02867         op->layout = NULL;
02868 
02869         /* UI_LAYOUT_OP_SHOW_EMPTY ignored */
02870     }
02871     else {
02872         wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
02873         PointerRNA ptr;
02874         int empty;
02875 
02876         RNA_pointer_create(&wm->id, op->type->srna, op->properties, &ptr);
02877 
02878         /* main draw call */
02879         empty = uiDefAutoButsRNA(layout, &ptr, check_prop, label_align) == 0;
02880 
02881         if (empty && (flag & UI_LAYOUT_OP_SHOW_EMPTY)) {
02882             uiItemL(layout, IFACE_("No Properties"), ICON_NONE);
02883         }
02884     }
02885 
02886     /* its possible that reset can do nothing if all have PROP_SKIP_SAVE enabled
02887      * but this is not so important if this button is drawn in those cases
02888      * (which isn't all that likely anyway) - campbell */
02889     if (op->properties->len) {
02890         uiBlock *block;
02891         uiBut *but;
02892         uiLayout *col; /* needed to avoid alignment errors with previous buttons */
02893 
02894         col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
02895         block = uiLayoutGetBlock(col);
02896         but = uiDefIconTextBut(block, BUT, 0, ICON_FILE_REFRESH, IFACE_("Reset"), 0, 0, 18, 20,
02897                                NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, TIP_("Reset operator defaults"));
02898         uiButSetFunc(but, ui_layout_operator_buts__reset_cb, op, NULL);
02899     }
02900 
02901     /* set various special settings for buttons */
02902     {
02903         uiBut *but;
02904         
02905         for (but = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout)->buttons.first; but; but = but->next) {
02906             /* no undo for buttons for operator redo panels */
02907             uiButClearFlag(but, UI_BUT_UNDO);
02908             
02909             /* if button is operator's default property, and a text-field, enable focus for it
02910              *  - this is used for allowing operators with popups to rename stuff with fewer clicks
02911              */
02912             if ((but->rnaprop == op->type->prop) && (but->type == TEX)) {
02913                 uiButSetFocusOnEnter(CTX_wm_window(C), but);
02914             }
02915         }
02916     }
02917 }
02918 
02919 /* this is a bit of a hack but best keep it in one place at least */
02920 MenuType *uiButGetMenuType(uiBut *but)
02921 {
02922     if (but->menu_create_func == ui_item_menutype_func) {
02923         return (MenuType *)but->poin;
02924     }
02925     else {
02926         return NULL;
02927     }
02928 }
